Mr. FOSTER. Mr. BR-ODE‘UR. In our Civil Code there is a provision with regard to privileges and hypothecs' but the word ‘privileges’ seems to have‘no meaning in the clause and should be stricken out.

Mr. FOSTER. Mr. BRODEUR. Mr. FOSTER. Mr. BRO'DEL'R. Not necessarily.

Mr. FOSTER. Do you think it wise to invest trust‘ funds in any but iirst mort- gages; if it is only a lien it may be a very uncertain kind of security.
